Type Alias# IODetailedTimingInformationV2

macOS 10.1+

```
typedef struct IODetailedTimingInformationV2 IODetailedTimingInformationV2;
```

## [Topics](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2#1608658)

[`horizontalActive`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386525-horizontalactive)Pixel clocks per line.[`horizontalBlanking`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386867-horizontalblanking)Blanking clocks per line.[`horizontalBorderLeft`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386910-horizontalborderleft)Number of pixels in left horizontal border.[`horizontalBorderRight`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386906-horizontalborderright)Number of pixels in right horizontal border.[`horizontalScaled`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386940-horizontalscaled)If the mode is scaled, sets the size of the image before scaling or rotation.[`horizontalScaledInset`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386630-horizontalscaledinset)If the mode is scaled, sets the number of active pixels to remove the left and right edges in order to display an underscanned image.[`horizontalSyncConfig`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386197-horizontalsyncconfig)kIOSyncPositivePolarity for positive polarity horizontal sync (0 for negative).[`horizontalSyncLevel`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386460-horizontalsynclevel)Zero.[`horizontalSyncOffset`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386455-horizontalsyncoffset)First clock of horizontal sync.[`horizontalSyncPulseWidth`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1385903-horizontalsyncpulsewidth)Width of horizontal sync.[`maxPixelClock`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386256-maxpixelclock)Maximum pixel clock frequency in Hz, with error.[`minPixelClock`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1385762-minpixelclock)Minimum pixel clock frequency in Hz, with error.[`numLinks`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386401-numlinks)number of links to be used by a dual link timing, if zero, assume one link.[`pixelClock`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1385975-pixelclock)Pixel clock frequency in Hz.[`scalerFlags`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386950-scalerflags)If the mode is scaled, kIOScaleStretchToFit may be set to allow stretching. kIOScaleRotateFlags is mask which may have the value given by kIOScaleRotate90, kIOScaleRotate180, kIOScaleRotate270 to display a rotated framebuffer.[`signalConfig`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386578-signalconfig)kIOAnalogSetupExpected set if display expects a blank-to-black setup or pedestal. See VESA signal standards.[`signalLevels`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386883-signallevels)One of:[`verticalActive`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386920-verticalactive)Number of lines per frame.[`verticalBlanking`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386655-verticalblanking)Blanking lines per frame.[`verticalBorderBottom`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386527-verticalborderbottom)Number of lines in bottom vertical border.[`verticalBorderTop`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386386-verticalbordertop)Number of lines in top vertical border.[`verticalScaled`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386813-verticalscaled)If the mode is scaled, sets the size of the image before scaling or rotation.[`verticalScaledInset`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386086-verticalscaledinset)If the mode is scaled, sets the number of active lines to remove the top and bottom edges in order to display an underscanned image.[`verticalSyncConfig`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1385877-verticalsyncconfig)kIOSyncPositivePolarity for positive polarity vertical sync (0 for negative).[`verticalSyncLevel`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386863-verticalsynclevel)Zero.[`verticalSyncOffset`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1386497-verticalsyncoffset)First line of vertical sync.[`verticalSyncPulseWidth`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1385779-verticalsyncpulsewidth)Height of vertical sync.[`bitsPerColorComponent`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/2937381-bitspercolorcomponent)[`colorimetry`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/2937389-colorimetry)[`dscCompressedBitsPerPixel`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/3131500-dsccompressedbitsperpixel)[`dscSliceHeight`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/3131501-dscsliceheight)[`dscSliceWidth`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/3131502-dscslicewidth)[`dynamicRange`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/2937358-dynamicrange)[`pixelEncoding`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/2937412-pixelencoding)[`verticalBlankingExtension`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/2869555-verticalblankingextension)[`verticalBlankingMaxShrinkPerFrame`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/3753513-verticalblankingmaxshrinkperfram)[`verticalBlankingMaxStretchPerFrame`](/documentation/kernel/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/3753514-verticalblankingmaxstretchperfra)##
